Magento is an open source & enterprise e-commerce application that can be incorporated with the latest technology of cloud computing. We allow you to install Magento through shell or administrative access on your virtual cloud machine. You can also install various other scripts and applications on the cloud server. Moreover, we at BODHost.com offer a free installation of Magento with our cloud hosting services.
